summary: BAD WIRE IN STEERING WHEEL, WHICH MAKES HORN MALFUNCTION FREQUENTLY(IF I REPEATEDLY TURN WHEEL, HORN WILL WORK). THIS STARTED THREE YEARS AGO. CAR HAS BEEN WELL MAINTAINED, AND I SEE NO RECALL FOR THIS ISSUE. I ALSO HAVE A BAD SENSOR UNDER THE PASSENGER SEAT, WHICH ALLOWS AIRBAG TO BE ON OR OFF WHEN PASSENGER IS IN SEAT(DOESN'T SEEM TO WORK).
